kv8.7:5.1: ☑ Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi rūpāyatanaṃ, tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv8.7:5.3: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:5.5: atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi rūpāyatanaṃ, tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv8.7:5.7: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ atthi rasāyatanaṃ, tāya jivhāya taṃ rasaṃ sāyati …pe…
kv8.7:5.8: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv8.7:6.2: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:6.4: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:6.6: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:6.9: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv8.7:7.1: ☑ Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, na ca tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:7.3: Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi rūpāyatanaṃ, na ca tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?
kv8.7:7.5: atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, na ca tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:7.8: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, na ca tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:8.2: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, na ca tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv8.7:8.5: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, na ca tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?
kv8.7:9.1: ☑ Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?
kv8.7:9.3: Atthi tattha mūlagandho sāragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho āmagandho vissagandho sugandho duggandhoti?
kv8.7:10.1: ☑ Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ atthi rasāyatanaṃ, tāya jivhāya taṃ rasaṃ sāyatīti?
kv8.7:10.3: Atthi tattha mūlaraso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso ambilaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ kaṭukaṃ loṇiyaṃ khāriyaṃ lambilaṃ kasāvo sādu asādūti?
kv8.7:11.1: ☑ Atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?
kv8.7:11.3: Atthi tattha kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ sukhasamphassaṃ dukkhasamphassaṃ garukaṃ lahukanti?
kv8.7:12.4: Nanu atthi tattha ghānanimittaṃ jivhānimittaṃ kāyanimittanti?
kv8.7:12.6: Hañci atthi tattha ghānanimittaṃ jivhānimittaṃ kāyanimittaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
